parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns whether the unit is bleeding.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''isBleeding''' unit

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[if]] ([[isBleeding]] [[player]]) [[then]] { [[player]] [[groupChat]] "I'm bleeding!!"; }</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[getBleedingRemaining]], [[isBurning]], [[setBleedingRemaining]]
</value></part></template></root>
